emails.subject: Proposal for Q4 Services
emails.body: Hello, We reviewed your service catalog and would like a detailed proposal for Q4. Please include pricing tiers and SLAs.

emails.subject: Re: Proposal for Q4 Services
emails.body: Thank you for your interest. I have attached a draft proposal with pricing options. Let me know if you need adjustments.

emails.subject: Re: Proposal for Q4 Services
emails.body: The pricing looks good. Could you clarify support response times?

emails.subject: Re: Proposal for Q4 Services
emails.body: Our SLAs guarantee 4-hour response for critical issues and 24-hour for others. See page 3 of the attached SLA.pdf.

emails.subject: Re: Proposal for Q4 Services
emails.body: Understood. I'm sharing this with my team and will get back by next week.

emails.subject: Re: Proposal for Q4 Services
emails.body: Sounds good. Looking forward to your feedback.
